Topic.Title: Obama admin Sibelius refuses to help dying girl

Message.Msg: Just to clarify the usual misinformation posted by fake ricky, the organ transplant system is run by a non-profit group called UNOS, under contract to HHS. They have very strict rules for allocating organs and a very formal process for changing those rules. Ultimately the Board of Directors, made up mostly of physicians, sets policy for allocating organs after public input. UNOS has been in place since Reagan created it in 1984. If UNOS is a death panel, it's Reagan's death panel, not Obama's. Kathleen Sebelius is not on the Board of Directors. She cannot arbitrarily change the rules about who gets organs. But let us be perfectly clear about this. The parents of this girl are asking that an exception to the UNOS rules be made to prioritize their daughter for a lung transplant that is less likely to work for her than for someone else. If they get an exception that means someone else higher up on the list under the current policies will not get a transplant and will die. You are asking Kathleen Sebelius to to ignore established rules made democratically. You are asking her to unilaterally decide that this girl will have a chance to live, a decision that would automatically result in the death of another person. You are asking her to be a death panel. She is refusing. The other person who will die if you get your way is nameless and faceless. It is easy to root for a little girl whose name and face you can see. But it is sickening to watch people like you literally play politics with peoples lives. You are willing to kill people for some cheap political points.

Topic.Title: Obama admin Sibelius refuses to help dying girl

Message.Msg: "If they get an exception that means someone else higher up on the list under the current policies will not get a transplant and will die. You are asking Kathleen Sebelius to to ignore established rules made democratically. You are asking her to unilaterally decide that this girl will have a chance to live, a decision that would automatically result in the death of another person. You are asking her to be a death panel. She is refusing" This is a another liberal ricky attempt to distort and lie about the facts. Signing the waiver would have allowed the little girl to get on the recipient list it would not move her to the top of the list she is in line with everyone else and does not get priority over anyone above her on the list. Sibelius by not signing the waiver denied the little girl any chance at this life saving procedure. She is in charge of your healthcare under Obamacare. UNOS is not the death panel, under Obamacare the Independent Payment Advisory Board is the death panel. This 15-member board is tasked under the law with determining which patients ought to receive which treatments. Under the law, if the board isn’t in place, its powers devolve to Health and Human Services Secretary Kathleen Sebelius.

Topic.Title: Obama admin Sibelius refuses to help dying girl

Message.Msg: She is trying to be added to the priority list to receive an adult lung. Due to her not being a good candidate for an adult, she is not on the priority list, she is on the bottom of the adult lung list. If she gets an adult lung for being on the priority list another person won't. That person will likely die. That is reality. Sebelius cannot issue a waiver to UNOS policies. She is not in charge of your healthcare. There is no death panel. The Independent Payment Advisory Board is a Board that makes recommendations to Congress about which treatments (e.g., acupuncture, or a brand name drug when a generic is available) should be covered by Medicare & Medicaid. Congress makes the ultimate decision. The Board is currently called the Medicare Payment Advisory Committee--it is already in place--but will have a new name and some slightly expanded functions soon. It absolutely does not determine "which patients ought to receive treatments" or make individual treatment decisions. Fake ricky is liar. He and the Tea Party are playing politics with peoples lives. They are sick, despicable people.

Topic.Title: Obama admin Sibelius refuses to help dying girl

Message.Msg: No, Jon, Sebelius did not issue a waiver. A judge ordered UNOS to place to waive their policy in this case and place her on the priority list for an adult lung. It is a very disturbing decision. What you have in this case is a judge making a medical decision, exactly what you say you don't want. Is this now the rule, overturning three decades of policy set by independent medical experts? Judges determine who lives and who dies? That's your death panel. Good job, Tea Brains.

Topic.Title: Obama admin Sibelius refuses to help dying girl

Message.Msg: DHHS is over OPTN, since Sibelius is over DHHS she has the authority direct OPTN to conduct an experimental variance which she refused. We can only hope that we are never in a situation where whether or not we receive life saving health care is in the hands people like liberal ricky and sibelius. Liberal ricky if it were up to you would you sign the waiver to save this little girl? The death panel-The Independent Payment Advisory Board, or IPAB, is a fifteen-member United States Government agency created in 2010 by sections 3403 and 10320 of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act that grants IPAB the authority to make changes to the Medicare program. The board's cost-cutting mandate will inevitably bring about a reduction in care and gives the IPAB unprecedented, dangerous authority to cut Medicare pay rates and strangle access to care. The sole function of the IPAB is to cut spending with little guarantee of maintaining quality, access, and scientifically proven care. There may be no physician representation on the board either.

Message.Msg: There was a creep in the San Diego area a few years back. He roamed upper class neighborhoods at 2 and 3 AM in the morning with dreadlocks. Cops stopped him numerous times to check him out. He eventually tried suing them for "Didcrimination". It was probably his plan all along. I've been stopped several times years ago in the evening while walking to my car. I simply identified myself and why I was there. No prob. As long as cops are polite when they approach you I've no grievence. Zimmerman never approached this turd and simply followed him until told not to. He then turned and walked back to his vehicle.
